snippet: Oscar Pistorius’s defense lawyer began to rebuild his case after days of grueling interrogation by the prosecutor, who has accused the athlete of lying and changing his testimony.
abstract: Oscar Pistorius, leaving witness stand, reads Valentine's card that he received from his girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp minutes before he shot her; tearful moment on the stand follows days of grueling cross-examination in which prosecutors have accused the athlete of lying and changing his testimony.
lead_paragraph: Oscar Pistorius’s defense lawyer began to rebuild his case after days of grueling interrogation by the prosecutor, who has accused the athlete of lying and changing his testimony.

headline.main: Reading Valentine’s Card, Pistorius Leaves the Stand
headline.print_headline: Reading Valentine’s Card, Pistorius Leaves the Stand
